resources.string:
The purpose of this app is to help users avoid distractions on their phone. Many of us have distractions such as notifications, social media platforms, messages and many other things. This app hopes to address those issues by preventing pop up notifications and incoming messages that otherwise take your focus away. This app is designed specifically for android phones. 


Set up:


1) On the main screen tap "Set Up Preset" at the bottom of the page.

 2) Enter the name you wish to call your new setting and select which apps you want enabled or disabled. Enabled means that incoming messages and notifications will continue as usual. Disabled means the messages and notifications will not appear to distract you. When finished, click the "Create" button at the bottom of the page. 

 3) To activate or use your created setting, tap the name of the setting. If it turns pink, that setting is active and working on your phone. To turn the setting off, simply tap the button again and the pink color will disappear. Neutral color means the setting is not active on your phone and no blocking is engaged. 

 4) To create additional settings, repeat steps 1 through 3. 5) To delete a setting or modify your previous choice of which apps to block or enable, click the "Modify" button next to the name of the setting. This will take you back to the Set Up Page where you can change your enabled and disabled settings. Click "Create" at the bottom of the page to apply your new preferences, or click "Delete" at the bottom of the page to erase the setting completely.
Thank you for downloading our app! Before you get started we need access to your notifications to prevent those dastardly distractions!
